items.text: I wrote two classes that solve this problem on my project.
items.href: Clean way in GWT/Java to wait for multiple asynchronous events to finish - Stack Overflow

items.text: Basically, each individual callback registers with a parent.
items.href: Clean way in GWT/Java to wait for multiple asynchronous events to finish - Stack Overflow

items.text: The parent waits for each child callback to complete, then fires off it's own handleSuccess().
